monogr.title: Acts of the International Congress “Comparative Liturgy Fifty Years after Anton Baumstark (1872–1948),” Rome, 25–29 September 1998

body.bibl: Brock, Sebastian P. “Invocations to/for the Holy Spirit in Syriac Liturgical Texts: Some Comparative Approaches.” In Acts of the International Congress “Comparative Liturgy Fifty Years after Anton Baumstark (1872–1948),” Rome, 25–29 September 1998, edited by Robert F.
